participant_1.background:
I have a warm, welcoming smile that makes people want to be my friend.
i love to cut down trees.
sometimes i wish i did not have to wake up in the morning.
I love to tinker with my convertible car and take it for a spin on the weekends.
i work for the discovery channel creating videos.

participant_2.background:
I'm still looking for someone to share my life with.
I'm always on the lookout for new and exciting ways to challenge myself, both physically and mentally.
I bought a ball for my dog, Toto.
I don't always remember to give my cats enough food.
my father is a preacher.

content.text: I am looking for a friend to share my life with.
It's great that you are looking for a friend to share your life with! I am still looking for someone too.
I'm always on the lookout for new and exciting ways to challenge myself, both physically and mentally.
I like that! I like to tinker with my convertible car and take it for a spin on the weekends.
That sounds like fun! I do not have a convertible car, but I do have a dog named Toto.
I love dogs! I wish I had one.
I do not always remember to give my cats enough food.
That's okay! I am sure they forgive you.
I am glad you think so! My father is a preacher.
That's interesting! I work for the discovery channel creating videos.
That sounds like a cool job! I am always interested in learning new things.
I am glad you are interested! I love learning new things too.
